author: P1281LBmohammada
title: It was great hotel. Clean and the breakfast buffet is amazing.
text: Great hotel. Courteous staff. Good location. Breakfast buffet is amazing. The lounge area is great for adults to relax and there are activities for children. I recommend getting a higher floor with better views. Walking distance from times square and Central park. Also walking distance to halal guys cart
